      Turns a HashedAggregator of index type Integer, and turns it into FunctionGradient.SparseGradient, where the keys are parameter indices and the values their partial derivative.

      • toGradient

        public static FunctionGradient toGradient(HashedAggregator<Integer> summedParams)
        Turns a HashedAggregator of index type Integer, and turns it into FunctionGradient.SparseGradient, where the keys are parameter indices and the values their partial derivative.
        Parameters:
        summedParams - the HashedAggregator to transform
        Returns:
        a FunctionGradient.SparseGradient

      • pdIdSet

        public static Set<Integer> pdIdSet(FunctionGradient a,
                                   FunctionGradient b)
        Returns the set of parameter ids with non-zero partial derivatives across two gradients. That is, nonZero(a) U nonZero(b)
        Parameters:
        a - the first gradient
        b - the second gradient
        Returns:
        a set of the partial derivative ids
